---
title: "Catchment areas and travel times for ambulances in the Frankston region"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(leaflet)
load("ambcatchment.Rda")
```
<br>

Colours show the regions that are closer to a certain ambulance station than any other.

Click on a contourline to see the estimated travel time. 

Simulation was carried out using predicted traffic conditions for 1:00am using the "optimistic" traffic conditions
from Google maps.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
m
```
